definition: abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4
Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

sentences.english: They returned the kindness to Chairman Li and the National People's Congress of China.
sentences.chinese: 他們也向李委員長和中國全國人大轉達了問候。

sentences.english: The special committees of the NPC also conduct various types of examinations of law enforcement work.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大各專門委員會也開展形式多樣的執法檢查。

sentences.english: The Portuguese parliament has maintained good contacts and exchanges with the National People's Congress of China and the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Gama said.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄牙議會同中國全國人大和政協有着很好的交往。

sentences.english: A delegation of the NPC foreign affairs committee would visit Macedonia sometime this year.
sentences.chinese: 中國全國人大外委會代表團也將於今年訪馬。

sentences.english: After 5 years, new the arena that countrywide National People's Congress entered the history in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 五年後，新一屆的全國人大在北京登上了歷史的舞臺。

sentences.english: His 'Loquats' was stored in the general office of National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大辦公廳收藏《枇杷圖》一幅。

sentences.english: The former Vice Chairman of National People's Congress-Jiang Zhenghua held a cordial conversation with the Chairman-Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 原全國人大副委員長蔣正華與鄭元豹董事長親切交談。

definition: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4

definition: general congress/meeting of the whole committee
(Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4

definition: National People's Congress and Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
Li Keqiang (1955-), PRC politician, prime minister from 2013
the duration of a conference/the period over which a conference (or expo etc) is held/session/the date of a meeting
abbr. for 民主建港協進聯盟|民主建港协进联盟, Democratic alliance for the betterment of Hong Kong (DAB), Hong Kong pro-Beijing party
CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
